document_data.name: Tenser
document_data.mainbody: nser was a notable [[wizard]] who made his mark upon the Realms, alongside [[Bigby]], [[Elminster]], the [[Simbul]], [[Mordenkainen]], and [[Khelben]]. and ''[[Tenser's floating disk]]''.
document_data.Description: Tenser was a notable [[wizard]] who made his mark upon the Realms, alongside [[Bigby]], [[Elminster]], the [[Simbul]], [[Mordenkainen]], and [[Khelben]]. and ''[[Tenser's floating disk]]''.
document_data.Possessions:
Some of the many magical items possessed by Tenser included an ''[[amulet of proof against detection and location]]'', a ''[[cloak of displacement]]'', some ''[[dust of disappearance]]'', a ''[[pearl of the sirines]]'', a ''[[ring of human influence]]'', a ''[[ring of protection]] +3'', a ''[[ring of fire resistance]]'', a ''[[staff of the magi]]'', a ''[[staff of striking]]'', a ''[[staff of thunder and lightning]]'', and a ''[[wand of enemy detection]]''.

Tenser wore a distinctive outfit when he was admitted into the Circle of Eight, part of which included the ''[[cloak of the Weave]]''.
